message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. This is a fair price considering its value.  Let me know if you're interested!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't proceed with a purchase at $11,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,500? I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest but I'm not able to go as low as $9,500.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,250? I believe this price is still fair, considering the value of the product.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
